about_the_game:
Music Book

This Music themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Inspired by the music industry from relaxing piano to rockstars at gigs, expect a celebration of music culture, equipment, and instruments!

Contents

The Music book unlocks the following images:
  • Microphone - 13x31
  • Amp - 18x22
  • Keyboard - 23x24
  • Violin - 25x69
  • Harp - 32x36
  • Saxophone - 32x36
  • Bagpipes - 32x45
  • Trumpet - 39x16
  • Mute button - 44x44
  • Drumkit - 48x42
  • Notes - 51x46
  • MP3 - 56x30
  • Cassette - 59x37
  • Rockstar - 60x58
  • Boombox - 64x45
  • Band - 77x55
  • Piano - 97x61
  • Gig - 114x104
  • Equaliser - 161x92
  • Hot Cross Buns - 364x263

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Music Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
